alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Inland Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT, CHARLESTON AND COLLETON COUNTIES... At 321 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Adams Run, or 16 miles west of Johns Island, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Hilton Head Island, Beaufort, Port Royal, Edisto Beach, Johns Island, James Island, West Ashley and Clarendon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Inland Colleton
